name: Project TUNG
description:
Project TUNG is a In-Development student game project by the team Up N' Atom, A group of second year game development students at Falmouth University.

The game is a 3D Puzzler revolving around a small genetically modified gecko character trying to escape a laboratory - he must use his powerful tongue to grab, swing, and destroy the environment while his companion Cleo offers helpful advice.

This is a student project, so is being developed alongside other assignments and the final product will be a vertical slice as opposed to a full game. We are uploading to Itch.Io To get play testers to offer feedback about our game - and will be updating it every couple of weeks to get the latest data. Please check our play test questionnaire and bug tracker below after you play!

Questionnaire - https://forms.gle/Bsa74mzbW95UQQ2H6

Bug/Crash Tracker - https://forms.gle/QSCZXwRxvHkMYBXn7

Thank you for time and all of us here at Up N' Atom wish you a lovely day!
If you would like to hear from us and get updates on how were doing, get in touch at projecttunggame@gmail.com or follow us on twitter @projecttung

Instructions:

When downloaded you will need to extract all the files out of the zip folder. 

Then open the 32 or 64 folder depending on your operating system (32 or 64 bit), if your unsure run 32. Then have fun!
